Text:
Total Recall (2012) New HD TS 720p x264 Dual Audio[Hindi-Eng]-AK has much better audio (this one has a little too much bass and is more hollow sounding), but this video is cleaner looking and shows the WHOLE screen, whereas the other versions cut off the right side of the film by a large chunk! So we have a winner of sorts here. The very beginning has a couple of teens walking in front of the cam and sittings down but every thing I skimmed thru afterward seems to be distraction free.

Thanks, Froggie!
Ah, shit, turns out there are missing scenes all thru the whole damn video. Feel like a heel. Thanks anyway.

Very blurry, but not as badly cropped as the others.

Kind of watchable.
